msg.lotaslight.turnOff: To turn off these messages, use /lotaslight trc_showMessage false
msg.lotaslight.savestate.save.error: Can't perform this action: A savestate operation is already being carried out!
msg.lotaslight.savestate.save.error2: Can't save a savestate at savestate 0
msg.lotaslight.savestate.load.error: Can't perform this action: A loadstate operation is already being carried out!
msg.lotaslight.savestate.error.filenoexi: The savestate folder does not exist. %s
msg.lotaslight.savestate.deleteMore.sing: You are about to delete %s savestate! Do you want to continue? %s
msg.lotaslight.savestate.deleteMore.plur: You are about to delete %s savestates! Do you want to continue? %s
msg.lotaslight.savestate.deleteMore.hove: This can not be undone or stopped!
msg.lotaslight.savestate.deleteMore.erro: Can't delete a negative amount of savestates! (%s)
msg.lotaslight.savestate.reload: Reloading savestate index. This is necessary when you edit the savestates outside of Minecraft

gui.lotaslight.savestate.load.name: Loadstate screen
gui.lotaslight.savestate.omitted: Some savestates are omitted. "%s" to show them all
